code: import{resolveElements}from'../../utils/resolve-elements.mjs';function createSelectorEffect(subjectEffect){return(subject,values)=>{const elements=resolveElements(subject);const subscriptions=[];for(const element of elements){const remove=subjectEffect(element,values);subscriptions.push(remove);}return()=>{for(const remove of subscriptions)remove();};};}export{createSelectorEffect};
